# RUN: llvm-mc --triple hexagon -disassemble < %s | FileCheck %s

0xf1 0xc3 0x15 0xb0
# CHECK: r17 = add(r21, #31)
0x11 0xdf 0x15 0xf3
# CHECK: r17 = add(r21, r31)
0x11 0xdf 0x55 0xf6
# CHECK: r17 = add(r21, r31):sat
0xf1 0xc3 0x15 0x76
# CHECK: r17 = and(r21, #31)
0xf1 0xc3 0x95 0x76
# CHECK: r17 = or(r21, #31)
0x11 0xdf 0x15 0xf1
# CHECK: r17 = and(r21, r31)
0x11 0xdf 0x35 0xf1
# CHECK: r17 = or(r21, r31)
0x11 0xdf 0x75 0xf1
# CHECK: r17 = xor(r21, r31)
0x11 0xd5 0x9f 0xf1
# CHECK: r17 = and(r21, ~r31)
0x11 0xd5 0xbf 0xf1
# CHECK: r17 = or(r21, ~r31)
0x00 0xc0 0x00 0x7f
# CHECK: nop
0xb1 0xc2 0x5f 0x76
# CHECK: r17 = sub(#21, r31)
0x11 0xdf 0x35 0xf3
# CHECK: r17 = sub(r31, r21)
0x11 0xdf 0xd5 0xf6
# CHECK: r17 = sub(r31, r21):sat
0x11 0xc0 0xbf 0x70
# CHECK: r17 = sxtb(r31)
0x15 0xc0 0x31 0x72
# CHECK: r17.h = #21
0x15 0xc0 0x31 0x71
# CHECK: r17.l = #21
0xf1 0xff 0x5f 0x78
# CHECK: r17 = #32767
0xf1 0xff 0xdf 0x78
# CHECK: r17 = ##65535
0x11 0xc0 0x75 0x70
# CHECK: r17 = r21
0x11 0xc0 0xd5 0x70
# CHECK: r17 = zxth(r21)
